channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for OR
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for OR

item.title: Report X-2024030603
item.description:
Report X-2024030603

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-18T15:10:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-10
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE LEAKING CLASS 3 HAZMAT WAS RESPONDED TO BY RESPONDER, ACROSS FROM DOOR 19 IN WEST PRIMARY. THE PACKAGE WAS RETURNED TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. ONE OF THE FOUR 1-GALLON PLASTIC BOTTLES (TECHSPRAY ISOPROPYL ALCOHOL) INSIDE THE PACKAGE HAD LEAKED DUE TO A LOOSE LID, DAMAGING ONE OTHER BOTTLE IN THE PROCESS. PACKAGE IS BEING PROCESSED THROUGH THE DMP, AND ALL NON-DAMAGED MERCHANDISE WILL BE RETURNED TO THE SHIPPER VIA A SALVAGE DRUM.

item.title: Report X-2024030580
item.description:
Report X-2024030580

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-05
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONSIBLE MANAGEMENT PERSON DIRECTED THIS DESIGNATED RESPONDER TO RETRIEVE A WET PACKAGE FROM DOOR 24. RESPONDER RETRIEVED PACKAGE AND DETERMINED THE PACKAGE WAS COMPROMISED DUE TO RAINWATER. AFTER VERIFYING THE CONTENTS OF COMPROMISED PACKAGE, RESPONDER SAW THAT THE INNER PACKAGING HAD A LIMITED QUANTITY DIAMOND LABEL ON EACH BOX. CHECKED THE OUTSIDE OF THE ORIGINAL BOX AND DID NOT FIND ANY DECLARATION OF A HAZARDOUS MATERIAL. ADVISED RMP. RMP CONTACTED THE HAZARDOUS MATERIALS SERVICE CENTER. AFTER SPEAKING WITH HMSC, DIRECTED TO INPUT THE PACKAGE AS A POSSIBLE UNDECLARED INTO THE ELECTRONIC TRACKING AND TRACING SYSTEM.

item.title: Report X-2024030584
item.description:
Report X-2024030584

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-15T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: PACKAGE FOUND DAMAGED ON PD-4 UNDERSLIDE SUSPECTED OF LEAKING. CALL MADE TO PSC FOR CLEAN UP. RESPONDER WENT TO SPILL LOCATION FOLLOWED SMALL PACKAGED DECISION TREE AND DONNED PPE. PACKAGE AND AFFECTED DEBRIS WERE BROUGHT TO THE PSC FOR PROCESSING. UPON INSPECTION, REWRAP; NO LEAK, AEROSOL CANS WERE FOUND AND OUTER PACKAGE HAD NO INDICATION OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS.

item.title: Report X-2024021905
item.description:
Report X-2024021905

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-13
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2024021905: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WENT TO A LEAKER AT UNLOAD DOOR 10. RESPONDER ARRIVED WITH PPE ON AND THEN FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. FOUND THIS PACKAGE WAS AFFECTED BY ANOTHER LEAKING PACKAGE. BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO PSC AND AFTER FURTHER EXAMINATION. THE PACKAGE IS SUSPECTED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT. X-2024021907: DESIGNATED RESPONDER WENT TO A LEAKING PACKAGE AT DOOR 10. RESPONDER ARRIVED WITH PPE ON AND THEN FOLLOWED THE DECISION TREE AND THE APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET. PACKAGE WAS BOUGHT BACK TO THE PSC AND THEN FURTHER EXAMINING THAT THE PACKAGE IS SUSPECTED TO BE AN UNDECLARED HAZMAT PACKAGE.
